attributes.action: stop the outrageous price differentials between the UK and US that see us paying in pounds what they pay in dollars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rip-off Britain is alive and well. This week sees yet another example of companies over-charging UK customers for identical products with the launch of Adobe's Lightroom software - £147 for us and $199 for them. That's for identical, downloaded software. This holds true for so many consumer items it's beyond a joke.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps several in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/dollarforpound/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
